CoinbaseTransaction - Class in com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model
A CoinbaseTransaction is a transaction that is created when a miner finds a new block So they are rewarded with this transaction for their efforts

Simple coinbase transaction for which is created/paid when a miner successfully mines a block.
